statements: DELETE FROM real_time_data_processing_in_5G_edge_computing WHERE id = 100 AND data_type = 'temperature';
DELETE FROM real_time_data_processing_in_5G_edge_computing WHERE location = 'New York' AND data_value < 50;
DELETE FROM edge_computing WHERE edge_id = 100 AND latency_ms < 50;
DELETE FROM edge_computing WHERE edge_location = 'New York' AND latency_ms > 50;
DELETE FROM edge_devices WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM latency_metrics WHERE latency_id IN (SELECT latency_id FROM latency_metrics WHERE device_id = 3 ORDER BY latency_timestamp DESC)
